title: NGIP-2 : Name of Token for NPC Claim
body:
{Summary/ Plan A}
NPCs will need a currency to pool for others when being interacted with. 
What should the name of the native NPC currency be? 

Not on the list ?
Let your voice be heard : 
in discord or
https:/t.me/NPCGuild

(Non Player) Crystals $NPC
Money (for NPCs) mNPC
Gold (for NPCs) gNPC
NPC Gold $NPCG
author: 0x96706EB471F875a9a41442f358d3B34ba02F868b
